# Helvety

> The main Helvety website. Software and subscriptions engineered and designed in Switzerland.

## Core Pages
- [Home](https://helvety.com): Main landing page for Helvety
- [Privacy Policy](https://helvety.com/privacy): How Helvety handles user data, compliant with Swiss nDSG
- [Terms of Service](https://helvety.com/terms): Terms governing use of Helvety services
- [Impressum](https://helvety.com/impressum): Legal information and company details

## Helvety Ecosystem
- [Helvety Store](https://store.helvety.com): Official store for Helvety software products and subscriptions
- [Helvety PDF](https://pdf.helvety.com): Free, privacy-focused PDF toolkit that processes files locally in the browser
- [Helvety Auth](https://auth.helvety.com): Centralized authentication service for all Helvety apps
- [Helvety Contacts](https://contacts.helvety.com): End-to-end encrypted contact management
- [Helvety Tasks](https://tasks.helvety.com): End-to-end encrypted task management

## Optional
- [GitHub](https://github.com/CasparRubin/helvety): Public monorepo for all Helvety applications (source-visible, not open source)
